title: Ellis Island Part of Statue of Liberty National Monument: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials Browse our ever-growing collection of lesson plans and other other activities and items for your use.  Help your students connect with Ellis Island and immigration in your classroom and at the museum itself. All Curriculum Materials   Lesson Plan    Checking In Lesson Plan Learn More     Field Trips The Ellis Island Immigration Museum can be a highlight of your immigration unit.  Browse our offerings to find one that will work for you and your students. Or, with more planning, you can lead your students through the museum with the help of lesson plans and other support materials. All Field Trips   Field Trips    Be an Inspector! Learn More     Traveling Trunks Learn more about Ellis Island's Traveling Trunk, our "Park-in-a-Pack" and stay tuned for another traveling trunk option, to be piloted soon. All Traveling Trunks   Traveling Trunk    Park-in-a-Pack Learn More
